general.gigTitle: do website development, business website or custom website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Web Developer, SEO and Google Ads Professional
sellerCard.description:
Hello, I'm Shazid, a digital marketing expert with over 5+ years of experience offering services in Google Ads, SEO, WordPress website development, Amazon Ads, and Facebook Ads. 

My goal is to help businesses grow their online presence, drive targeted traffic, and boost sales through customized strategies. 

Whether you need a high-performing Google Ads campaign, SEO optimization, a responsive WordPress website, effective Amazon Ads, or targeted Facebook Ads, I'm here to deliver results. 

Let's collaborate today to achieve success for your business!

description.content:
Are you looking for someone to build a powerful online presence with a unique and functional Website Development? 


You're in the right place!


I'll offer you top-notch services of Website Development, like Business Websites or functional custom Web.site Development.


As an extensive experienced Full-Stack Developer, I will develop a visually appealing and user-friendly web.site that truly reflects your brand and helps you achieve your online objectives. Whether it's front-end or back-end development, I've got you covered with expertise and attention to detail.


What I Offer:


  • Eye-Catchy Front-end & Secured Backend Development
  • Custom Website Development
  • Figma to Website Development
  • API Development & API Integration
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • Fully Responsive


Specialized Technologies:

Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Next JS, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap

Backend: PHP Laravel, Node JS, Express JS

Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL


Why Choose Me?

  • Highly Experienced
  • Excellent Communication with FiverrZoom Meeting
  • 100% Client Satisfaction with on-time delivery
  • 24/7 Available


Let's create a visually appealing and functional Custom site. Order now!

slide.name: do website development, business website or custom website development

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your experience in Website development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For the past five years, I've worked as a full-stack web developer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you convert PSD/Xd/Figma to React?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can convert the PSD/Xd/Figma to the Responsive Website design. I'd need the PSD/Xd/Figma file.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be compatible with mobile devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all of the websites I create are fully responsive and mobile-friendly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be allowed to make future changes to the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you may easily change your website in the future, and I will also guide you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is Full Stack Development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Full Stack Development is the development of both the frontend (client-side) and backend (server-side) of a web application. It covers everything from creating the user interface to administering the server and database.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you use for Full Stack Development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Depending on the project's requirements, I employ a range of technologies. Typically, the frontend technologies include React.js or Next.js, while the backend uses Node.js and Express.js. The database is managed using MongoDB.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What services are included in this gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: - UI/UX design - Frontend development - Backend development - Database integration - API development and integration - Testing and debugging - Deployment and maintenance

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer any assistance after the site is launched?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide 30-day free assistance, however you can contact me after one month. I am always available to assist you with your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to complete a Full Stack Development project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The timeline for a project varies based on the complexity and requirements. Generally, a basic project might take 2-4 weeks, while more complex projects could take several months.

milestones.title: Requirements
milestones.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

milestones.title: Design Concept
milestones.description: I'll design a concept for your website.

steps.title: Final Design
steps.description: I'll deliver the final website design for your approval.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

milestones.title: First draft
milestones.description: I'll prepare a first draft of the delivery.

steps.title: Progress check
steps.description: We'll meet to review your project status and the steps needed to finish it.

steps.title: Modifications
steps.description: I'll modify assets based on your feedback.

milestones.title: Delivery
milestones.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: This project was scheduled to be completed in 10 days but it took 32 days to complete this project. I made several requests for updates to be made to the website as there was lack of attention to details.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your feedback. I sincerely apologize for the delay in completing the project. My goal is always to deliver high-quality work on time, but in this case, some delays occurred due to waiting for client responses and ensuring everything was completed properly. I truly appreciate your patience and the opportunity to work with you. I will take this as a learning experience and improve communication to ensure a smoother process in the future. Wishing you all the best!

reviews.comment: Shazid Hossain and his team were an absolute joy to work with on our website development project. Their attention to detail and professionalism truly exceeded our expectations, and their proactive communication made the process smooth and enjoyable. They delivered perfectly to our requirements and maintained a high level of politeness throughout10/10 service!

seller_response.comment:
Thank you so much for your kind words! It was an absolute pleasure working with you and your team on this project. Your clear vision and excellent collaboration made our job even more enjoyable. We truly appreciate your trust in us and are thrilled that we could meet your expectations.

Looking forward to future opportunities to work together! Wishing you all the success with your website.

Best regards,

reviews.comment: The custom website he built was flawless,unique design, smooth functionality, and perfectly tailored to my business needs. Its everything I wanted and more!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your valuable feedback. It was a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: The custom website he built was exceptional, unique, fully functional, and perfectly tailored to my business. Its exactly what I needed!

seller_response.comment: Thanks for the kind and Inspiring words, your words make me work even harder.

reviews.comment: Clear and consistent communication combined with timely delivery ensured a smooth process. We wholeheartedly recommend him for any website improvements.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your valuable feedback! We truly appreciate your support and are delighted to hear that you had a great experience. We look forward to serving you again.

reviews_snippet.comment: I must admit this was a challenging and complex endeavor something I could have never accomplished on my own. This was definitely a team effort, however after numerous revisions I am very pleased with the finished product. This seller went above and beyond the scope of this project. They were committed to making sure I got exactly what I wanted.I would definitely utilize them again.

Shazid Hossain did a FABULOUS job developing our website for Forest Hills Golf Club, exceeding all expectations with his professionalism and attention to detail. His cooperation and speedy delivery were remarkable, always willing to make modifications to enhance functionality and aesthetics. It has truly been a pleasure working with him!
Shazid Hossain did an AMAZING job with my website! His attention to details and thorough documentation reflect his professionalism. Working with him was a breeze due to his high level of cooperation.

-Exceeded expectations
-Great communication
-Timezone not a conflict
-Understood project goals 
-Delivered on time and what was asked
-Would recommend!
I had a fantastic experience working with Shazid on building my website. He is professional, responsive, and highly skilled in translating my vision into a functional site.
